Title: Prohibiting or limiting certain tax exemptions for real property in instances where a pattern or practice of discrimination against occupants has been found
Summary: Prohibits or limits certain tax exemptions for real property in instances where a pattern or practice of discrimination against occupants has been found based on such occupants' lawful source of income.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to prohibiting or limiting certain tax exemptions for real property in instances where a pattern or practice of discrimination against occupants has been found
